PREREQUISITE: (SE 430 or IS 435 or PM 430 or  MIS 674) and CS C451
IT 403 AND (CSC 451 or CSC 453 or CSC 455)

COURSE_NAME: Geographic Information Systems (Gis) for Community Development
Big Data and the Internet of Things (Iot)

PREREQUISITE: Completion of ten or more SoC MS level courses is required.

COURSE_NUMBER: Students must complete 1 CDM Open Elective Course chosen from either IS concentration courses from any IS concentration or other courses meeting the following rules:
Any CNS, CSC, ECT, GAM, GPH, HCI, HIT, IS, IT, PM, SE, or TDC course in the 421-699 range qualifies.
Credit for courses taken outside of CDM will only be given if approved by a faculty advisor.
